```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
```

## Bet, Sweat, and Forget Season 2 results

```{r}
x <- c(20, 40, 20, -10)
y <- c(-6, -12, 33, 20)
z <- 1:4
df<-data.frame(x,y,z)
ggplot(data = df)+
  geom_line(aes(x = df$z,y = df$x), color = "blue")+
  geom_line(aes(x = df$z,y = df$y), color = "red")

```
